annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: ΕΝ
annotations.translation: 英语

annotations.label: Page-header
annotations.text: Official Journal of the European Communities
annotations.translation: 欧洲共同体官方公报

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Whereas for the authorisation of new methods offering equivalent guarantees, it is appropriate to provide for a procedure of close cooperation between the Commission and the Member States analogous to those set out in Article 16 of Directive 64/433/EEC or in Article 21 of Directive 71/118/EEC or in Article 32 of Directive 90/539/EEC,
annotations.translation: 鉴于对提供同等保证的新方法的许可，应规定委员会与成员国之间的密切合作程序，类似于第 64/433/EEC 号指令第 16 条、第 71/118/EEC 号指令第 21 条或第 90/539/EEC 号指令第 32 条所规定的程序，

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: HAS ADOPTED THIS DECISION:
annotations.translation: 已通过以下决定：

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 1
annotations.translation: 第 1 条

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: In the Annex to Decision 95/409/EC, Section C shall be replaced by the following:
annotations.translation: 在第 95/409/EC 号决定附件中， C 节应替换为以下内容：

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: 'SECTION C
annotations.translation: “C 节

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: MICROBIOLOGICAL METHOD FOR THE EXAMINATION OF THE SAMPLES
annotations.translation: 用于检验样本的微生物学方法

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Microbiological testing of the samples for salmonella should be carried out to the standard of the International Organisation for Standardisation ISO 6579: 1993 or revised editions, or by the method described by the Nordic Committee on Food Analysis (NMKL method No 71, fourth edition, 1991) or revised editions. However, methods offering equivalent guarantees may be authorised in accordance with the procedure laid down in Article 16 of Directive 64/433/EEC.
annotations.translation: 对样本进行沙门氏菌微生物检测应遵循国际标准化组织的 ISO 6579:1993 标准或修订版，或采用北欧食品分析委员会描述的方法（NMKL 方法第 71 号，第四版，1991 年）或修订版。然而，提供同等保证的方法也可根据第 64/433/EEC 号指令第 16 条规定的程序获得许可。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Where the results of analysis are contested between Member States, the standard of the International Organisation for Standardisation ISO 6579:1993 or revised editions should be regarded as the reference method.'
annotations.translation: 如果成员国之间对分析结果有异议，则应将国际标准化组织的 ISO 6579:1993 标准或修订版视为参考方法。”

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 2
annotations.translation: 第 2 条

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: In Annex A to Decision 95/410/EC, point 3 shall be replaced by the following point:
annotations.translation: 在第 95/410/EC 号决定附件 A 中，第 3 点应替换为以下内容：

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: '3. Microbiological method for the examination of the samples
annotations.translation: “3. 用于检验样本的微生物学方法

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Microbiological testing of the sample for salmonella should be carried out to the standard of the International Organisation for Standardisation ISO 6579: 1993 or revised editions, or by the method described by the Nordic Committee on Food Analysis (NMKL method No 71, fourth edition, 1991) or revised editions. However, methods offering equivalent guarantees may be authorised in accordance with the procedure laid down in Article 32 of Directive 90/539/EEC.
annotations.translation: 对样本进行沙门氏菌微生物检测应遵循国际标准化组织的 ISO 6579:1993 标准或修订版，或采用北欧食品分析委员会描述的方法（NMKL 方法第 71 号，第四版，1991 年）或修订版。然而，提供同等保证的方法也可根据第 90/539/EEC 号指令第 32 条规定的程序获得许可。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Where the results of analysis are contested between Member States, the standard of the International Organisation for Standardisation ISO 6579: 1993 or revised editions should be regarded as the reference method.'
annotations.translation: 如果成员国之间对分析结果有异议，则应将国际标准化组织的 ISO 6579: 1993 标准或修订版视为参考方法。”

annotations.label: Section-header
annotations.text: Article 3
annotations.translation: 第 3 条

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: In the Annex to Decision 95/411/EC Section C shall be replaced by the following:
annotations.translation: 在第 95/411/EC 号决定附件中，C 节应替换为以下内容：

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: 'SECTION C
annotations.translation: “C 节

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: MICROBIOLOGICAL METHOD FOR THE EXAMINATION OF THE SAMPLES
annotations.translation: 用于检验样本的微生物学方法

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Microbiological testing of the samples for salmonella should be carried out to the standard of the International Organisation for Standardisation ISO 6579: 1993 or revised editions, or by the method described by the Nordic Committee on Food Analysis (NMKL method No 71, fourth edition, 1991) or revised editions. However, methods offering equivalent guarantees may be authorised in accordance with the procedure laid down in Article 21 of Directive 71/118/EEC.
annotations.translation: 对样本进行沙门氏菌微生物检测应遵循国际标准化组织的 ISO 6579:1993 标准或修订版，或采用北欧食品分析委员会描述的方法（NMKL 方法第 71 号，第四版，1991 年）或修订版。然而，提供同等保证的方法也可根据第 71/118/EEC 号指令第 21 条规定的程序获得许可。

annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: Where the results of analysis are contested between Member States, the standard of the International Organisation for Standardisation ISO 6579: 1993 or revised editions should be regarded as the reference method.'
annotations.translation: 如果成员国之间对分析结果有异议，则应将国际标准化组织的 ISO 6579: 1993 标准或修订版视为参考方法。”
